column4: has anyone had a problem with zonealarm preventing them from accessing an ubuntu samba server?
Turn it off.. if u can get on the samba server u know its zone alarm........... in that instance check ur ZA settings
i have figured it is zonealarm now, just wondering if there was a setting specifically for local network access
dare i suggest uninstalling ZA .. so that it prompts you next time you attempt it. google for permitting the lan range of ips.. since i havent a clue where u set that.
